00013 typedef std::vector<Point>                         vec_p;
00014 typedef std::vector<Point>::iterator          p_iterator;
00015 typedef std::vector<Point>::const_iterator  c_p_iterator;
00016 typedef std::vector<double>::const_iterator c_d_iterator;
00017 typedef std::vector<int>                           vec_i;

00019 class Parameter
00020 {
00021 private:
00022   std::vector<double>                s; // path parameter value, 0<=s<1.0
00023   std::vector<int>        spline_index; // cubic curve segment index, 0<=index
00024   std::vector<double>            lhs_s; // path parameter distance to lhs sample
00025   std::vector<Point>    spline_samples; // spline evaluated at s
00026   std::vector<double>       deviations; // distance between spline_sample
00027                                         // and linearly-interpolated control point segment
00028   std::vector<int>         closest_raw; // index of closest raw point to spline sample
00029                                         // that forms line segment for deviation measurment
00030 public:
00031   void print                      (char const * const filename) const;
00032   void computeDeviations          (const std::vector<Point> & raw_points);
00033   void getRawPointsToDuplicate    (const std::vector<Point> & raw_points,
00034                                    std::vector<int> & raw_points_to_duplicate) const;
00035   double calcMinDistPtLineSegment (const Point & spline_sample,
00036                                    const Point & contour_point_1,
00037                                    const Point & contour_point_3) const;
00038 public:
00039   void addDeviation (double d)
00040   {
00041     deviations.push_back(d);
00042   }
00043   Parameter (void)
00044     :s(),spline_index(),lhs_s(),spline_samples(),deviations(),closest_raw()
00045   {
00046   }
00047 
00051   bool deviationsLarge (void)
00052   {
00053     double deviation_threshold = Controls::instance().getDeviationThreshold();
00054     // for each deviation
00055     for (c_d_iterator i = deviations.begin();i!=deviations.end();i++)
00056     {
00057       if (*i>deviation_threshold) return true;
00058     }
00059     return false;
00060   }
00061 
00066   void reserve (const int & target_num_samples)
00067   {
00068     s.clear();
00069     s.reserve(target_num_samples);
00070     spline_index.clear();
00071     spline_index.reserve(target_num_samples);
00072     lhs_s.clear();
00073     lhs_s.reserve(target_num_samples);
00074     spline_samples.clear();
00075     spline_samples.reserve(target_num_samples);
00076     deviations.clear();
00077     deviations.reserve(target_num_samples);
00078     closest_raw.clear();
00079     closest_raw.reserve(target_num_samples);
00080   }
00081 
00087   Point const * getPoint (const int & sample_index) const
00088   {
00089     int a = static_cast<int>(spline_samples.size())-1;
00090     if (sample_index<0)
00091     {
00092       return &spline_samples[0];
00093     }
00094     else if (sample_index>a)
00095     {
00096       return &spline_samples[a];
00097     }
00098     else
00099     {
00100       return &spline_samples[sample_index];
00101     }
00102   }
00103 
00107   void clearAndReserveSamples (void)
00108   {
00109     spline_samples.clear();
00110     spline_samples.reserve(s.size());
00111   }
00112 
00119   void add (const double & path_parameter_value,
00120             const int & index_of_spline,
00121             const double & delta_s_to_lhs)
00122   {
00123     s.push_back(path_parameter_value);
00124     spline_index.push_back(index_of_spline);
00125     lhs_s.push_back(delta_s_to_lhs);
00126   }
00127 
00136   void set (double new_s,int new_spline_index,int sample_index,double s_disp,Point p)
00137   {
00138     // now abs refers to lhs s parameter separation 
00139     assert(sample_index>=0);
00140     assert(sample_index<static_cast<int>(s.size()));
00141     s[sample_index] = new_s;
00142     spline_index[sample_index] = new_spline_index;
00143     int i0 = sample_index+1;
00144     if (i0==getNumSamples()) i0=0;
00145     assert(i0>=0);
00146     assert(i0<getNumSamples());
00147     double a = lhs_s[i0]-s_disp;
00148     assert(a>0.0);
00149     lhs_s[i0]=a;
00150     a = lhs_s[sample_index]+s_disp;
00151     assert(a>0.0);
00152     lhs_s[sample_index]=a;
00153     spline_samples[sample_index]=p;
00154   }
00155   int getNumSamplePoints (void) const
00156   {
00157     return spline_samples.size();
00158   }
00159   int getNumSamples (void) const
00160   {
00161     assert(s.size()==spline_index.size());
00162     return s.size();
00163   }
00164   double getParameterValue (int sample_index) const
00165   {
00166     assert(sample_index>=0);
00167     assert(sample_index<static_cast<int>(s.size()));
00168     return s[sample_index];
00169   }
00170   int getSplineIndex (int sample_index) const
00171   {
00172     assert(sample_index>=0);
00173     assert(sample_index<static_cast<int>(spline_index.size()));
00174     return spline_index[sample_index];
00175   }
00176   double getLhsS (int sample_index) const
00177   {
00178     assert(sample_index>=0);
00179     assert(sample_index<static_cast<int>(lhs_s.size()));
00180     assert(lhs_s[sample_index]>0.0);
00181     return lhs_s[sample_index];
00182   }
00183   void addSplineSample (Point p)
00184   {
00185     spline_samples.push_back(p);
00186   }
00187   c_d_iterator getFirstDeviationConst (void) const
00188   {
00189     return deviations.begin();
00190   }
00191   c_d_iterator getOnePastLastDeviationConst (void) const
00192   {
00193     return deviations.end();
00194   }
00195   c_p_iterator getFirstSplineSampleConst (void) const
00196   {
00197     return spline_samples.begin();
00198   }
00199   c_p_iterator getOnePastLastSplineSampleConst (void) const
00200   {
00201     return spline_samples.end();
00202   }
00203 };
